snippet: An auction will formally open California’s cap-and-trade system, intended to reduce carbon dioxide emissions by issuing allowances to polluters, then trading them in a market.
abstract: California's market-based system for reducing greenhouse gas emissions makes its formal debut with auction of state-issued pollution allowances; auction will open state's cap-and-trade system, allowing carbon dioxide emissions for virtually all sectors of the economy to be traded.
lead_paragraph: An auction will formally open California’s cap-and-trade system, intended to reduce carbon dioxide emissions by issuing allowances to polluters, then trading them in a market.

headline.seo: California to Hold Auction of Greenhouse Gas Emissions
headline.main: A Market in Emissions Is Set to Open in California
headline.print_headline: A Market In Emissions Is Set to Open In California
